response.original_title: First: The Official Film of the London 2012 Olympics
response.overview: In the summer of 2012, the most talented young athletes from around the world responded to the call to compete in the London 2012 Olympic Games. This is their story. Director Caroline Rowland meets 12 of them as they prepare for London 2012, giving us a glimpse into what defines them as people and as athletes. With unprecedented behind the scenes access to the greatest moments of the Games, "First" is the closest you can get to experiencing the London 2012 Olympic Games first hand.
response.title: First: The Official Film of the London 2012 Olympics
